title: Staged Sync    runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2022.08.1-alpha-7dabdc32
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Linux
Commit hash : 
7dabdc32
#### Expected behaviour
no runtime error 

#### Actual behaviour
